channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Which states are declaring emergencies over SNAP funding
item.description: As of Thursday, 14 states have announced funding for food banks, two have announced direct financial aid and six have announced a combination of both....

item.title: Trump wants to shatter the filibuster, another Senate norm. Republicans are pushing back.
item.description: Trump's second term has broken presidential norms at a breakneck pace, but his demand that Republicans initiate the "nuclear option" of ending of the ...

item.title: November SNAP benefits are on hold but grocers, apps are filling food gap
item.description: Millions of families are bracing for empty EBT cards this weekend as SNAP benefits pause — spurring grocers, delivery apps and nonprofits to move fast...

item.title: The rate cut skeptics' case
item.description: The hawks on the Federal Open Market Committee see resilient growth, booming financial markets, too-high inflation, and a labor market that is more or...

item.title: Behind the Curtain: Anti-AI socialism could be Democrats' future
item.description: Two unfolding forces will shape significantly the short-term future of the Democratic Party , officials tell us: The popularity of socialist candidate...

item.title: Vance defends saying he hopes his wife converts to Christianity
item.description: The vice president told students on Wednesday that he hopes his wife, Usha, who is Hindu, converts to Christianity someday.

item.title: U.S. Park Police seeks hundreds more officers amid Trump’s crime crackdown
item.description: A hiring spree would add hundreds more federal officers in the nation’s capital, according to documents reviewed by The Post.

item.title: Judge orders Trump administration to release billions in SNAP contingency funds
item.description: The government did rely on contingency funding to keep food aid going when it shut down during President Donald Trump’s first term.

item.title: Ohio approves new House map giving Republicans a leg up in two more seats
item.description: The new map received rare bipartisan agreement because Republicans who control the state legislature did not want to risk an election challenge from D...

item.title: Redistricting clears major hurdle in Virginia. Here’s what to know.
item.description: Democrats in the Virginia Senate took a big step Friday to enable lawmakers to draw new congressional maps, saying President Donald Trump has created ...

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
